description: As a team, we built an amphibian robot that can runs on both land and water, while avoiding obstacles.

event: Pertandingan Kuiz ICT, Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia

event: Dew Challenge: The Xtreme Ride, by Mountain Dew
